feed.title: Mini QR Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Mini QR: v0.18.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Improve URL detection and add protocol for URLs without one by @lyqht in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/125
  • Add changelog footer by @lyqht in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/126

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/compare/v0.17.1...v0.18.0

entry.title: New release for Mini QR: v0.18.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix script linebreak issues in changelog script by @lyqht in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/128
  • Fix vCard address formatting and add tests by @lyqht in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/130

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/compare/v0.18.0...v0.18.1

entry.title: New release for Mini QR: v0.19.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • add thai language by @lyqht in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/133
  • pwa automatic reload by @lyqht in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/137
  • Add vCard support for batch QR code generation by @lyqht in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/136
  • Translate Thai language strings by @lyqht in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/141

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/compare/v0.18.1...v0.19.0

entry.title: New release for Mini QR: v0.20.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix phone numbers not showing by @unililium in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/142
  • Bug fix: Copy to clipboard in Safari by @klemensgraf in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/143
  • Add all-contributors bot by @lyqht in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/147
  • Remove "Ignore header row" option from CSV processing by @lyqht in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/149

New Contributors

  • @unililium made their first contribution in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/142
  • @klemensgraf made their first contribution in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/143

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/compare/v0.19.0...v0.20.0

entry.title: New release for Mini QR: v0.21.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add Docker support with multi-stage build and nginx configuration by @pcbimon in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/153
  • Update contributors - update pcbimon and add seals187 by @lyqht in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/155

New Contributors

  • @pcbimon made their first contribution in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/153

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/compare/v0.20.0...v0.21.0
